short.es: Extensión del navegador para Ivanti Clients
short.fr,hr: Extension de navigateur pour les clients Ivanti
short.it: Estensione del browser per client Ivanti
short.ja: Ivanti クライアント用のブラウザ拡張機能
short.pl: Rozszerzenie do przeglądarki dla klientów Ivanti
short.zh_CN: Ivanti 客户端的浏览器扩展
short.zh_TW: Ivanti 用户端的瀏覽器延伸項目

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps users connect to Ivanti (Pulse Secure) VPN servers in an agentless mode, for secure remote access.  It can launch native Ivanti client applications from Ivanti Connect or Policy Secure webpages.  It requires a native host to complete the workflow.
